items.item: -- This is all we'll specify. ascii char: U+03B5 -- Books specifically have their color determined by ID.
nouse ascii char: U+00A7 fore sienna
equipable hand canfuck -- Metrics are needed if an item has canfuck. thickness: 2.75 length: 42 weight medium weapon damage: 50 skill: club ascii char: U+0021 fore darkgoldenrod

test description: "This is Foxite. It turns you into a fox with repeated usages." ascii char: U+00A1 fore aquamarine
consumed = 1 morph fox 0 window
equipable hand fireproof weapon damage: 30 skill: short_sword description: "A nice, sturdy combat knife." ascii char: U+2190 fore silver
test equipable hand fireproof weapon damage: 10 skill: short_sword description: "A nice, sturdy butter knife." ascii char: U+2190 fore silver
equipable ring fireproof ascii char: U+25CB fore firebrick

unique fireproof equipable hand weight heavy weapon damage: 100 skill: long_sword statbonus speed: 40 description: "Used by the legendary Knight of Time, this was once a perfectly functional ninja sword until the Knight broke it in half while doing battle with his brother." ascii char: U+2193 fore white

equipable hand weapon damage: 40 skill: polearm weight: heavy description: "A long pole with a sharpened point of steel on one end." ascii char: U+002F fore darkgoldenrod

equipable hand weapon damage: 40 skill: throwing weight: heavy description: "A long pole with a sharpened point of steel on one end, specifically designed for being thrown at the target." ascii char: U+002F fore darkgoldenrod
equipable hand fireproof weapon damage: 30 skill: short_sword description: "A classic-style rogue's dagger." ascii char: U+2190 fore silver
equipable hand fireproof weapon damage: 50 skill: axe weight: medium description: "An ordinary looking fire-axe." ascii char: U+00A2 fore silver
equipable hand fireproof weapon damage: 70 skill: axe weight: heavy description: "An imposing battle axe. You could take someone's head off with this baby." ascii char: U+00A2 fore silver
fireproof equipable hand weight medium weapon damage: 40 skill: short_sword description: "A plain but servicable short sword." ascii char: U+2193 fore white
fireproof equipable hand weight medium weapon damage: 50 skill: short_sword identify: weapon_knowledge description: "An exotic looking sword with a curved blade." ascii char: U+2202 fore silver
fireproof equipable hand weight heavy weapon damage: 50 skill: long_sword description: "A large sword with an emphasis on the blade's width." ascii char: U+2191 fore silver
fireproof equipable hand weight heavy weapon damage: 60 skill: long_sword description: "A large sword with an emphasis on length." ascii char: U+2191 fore silver

fireproof equipable hand twohanded weight heavy weapon damage: 70 skill: huge_sword identify: weapon_knowledge description: "A sword so large you need two hands to wield it." ascii char: U+221A fore silver
fireproof equipable hand weight medium weapon damage: 70 skill: long_sword identify: weapon_knowledge description: "The common samurai sword." ascii char: U+2193 fore silver
fireproof equipable hand weight medium weapon damage: 70 skill: long_sword identify: weapon_knowledge description: "The common samurai sword, but longer." ascii char: U+2193 fore silver
fireproof fearsome equipable hand weight medium weapon damage: 30 skill: club description: "A smallish but ornate statue of a festive holiday character." ascii char: U+0455 fore red

fireproof unique equipable hand twohanded weight medium weapon damage: 100 skill: warhammer description: "An impressive but sorta goofy-looking double-headed warhammer that has irons on both ends. As in, household appliances." ascii char: U+0444 fore lime
fireproof unique equipable hand weight heavy weapon damage: 300 skill: warhammer description: "Behold the glory of Zillyhoo!" ascii char: U+0444 fore blue

fireproof unique equipable hand weight medium weapon damage: 200 range: 30 skill: large_firearm description: "Plundered from some sunken galleon somewhere, this is no ordinary rifle -- it's a laser rifle!" ascii char: U+0141 fore blue

fireproof unique fearsome equipable hand weight medium weapon damage: 250 skill: chainsaw description: "Awesome. Demonic-looking. Not actually a tube of lipstick. This is a chainsaw to be reckoned with." ascii char: U+018C fore purple

fireproof equipable hand weight light weapon damage: 40 skill: whip increase: climax -- Increase token doesn't do shit without some extra code but it can be here anyway. description: "An ordinary but nevertheless slightly kinky whip." ascii char: U+03B6 fore brown

unique description: "A blood-red ruby in the shape of a droplet." ascii char: U+25CA fore crimson
-- Just display a nice custom error. !<< The ruby pendant has no use whatsoever, really. It just looks nice. >>

wip ascii char: U+00A1 fore lightsalmon
-- Text stolen from CoC's Whisker Fruit item, for now.
|<< You take a bite of the fruit and gulp it down. It's thick and juicy and has an almost overpowering sweetness. Nevertheless, it is delicious and you certainly could use a meal. You devour the fruit, stopping only when the hard, nubby pit is left, which you toss aside. >>
-- always increase speed gettokenval "speed" if it < 75 if it < 30 |<< [break]You feel...more balanced, sure of step. You're certain that you've become just a little bit faster. >> inctokenval "speed" 2 else if it < 60 |<< [break]You stumble as you shift position, surprised by how quickly you move. After a moment or two of disorientation, you adjust. You're certain that you can run faster now. >> inctokenval "speed" 1 else |<< [break]You pause mid-step and crouch. Your leg muscles have cramped up like crazy. After a few moments, the pain passes and you feel like you could chase anything down. >> inctokenval "speed" 0.5 endif endif -- end endif
-- sometimes increase charisma
-- grow cat ears checktoken "ears/cat" if not exists -- should check the existing type first |<< [break]Your ears tingle and begin to change shape. Within a few moments, they've become long and feline. Thanks to the new fuzzy organs, you find yourself able to hear things that eluded your notice up until now. [break]<cWhite>You now have cat ears.<c> >>
removetoken "ears" addtoken "ears" addtoken "ears" "cat" end endif
-- grow cat tail checktoken "tail/genbeast" if not exists -- should check the existing type first |<< [break]You pause and tilt your head... something feels different. Ah, that's what it is; you turn around and look down at your tail as it starts to change shape, narrowing and sprouting glossy fur. [break]<cWhite>You now have a cat tail.<c> >>
removetag "tail" addtoken "tail" addtoken "tail" "genbeast"
|<< [break]<cYellow>Now would be an excellent time to stop taking this stuff.<c> >> end endif
-- grow fangs
-- grow fur checktoken "fur" if not exists |<< [break]<cWhite>You grow fur all over. >> renametoken "skin" "fur" end endif
-- grow digitigrade legs
-- grow up to two extra breast rows

wip ascii char: U+00A1 fore mistyrose
-- Text stolen from CoC's Canine Pepper item, for now.
|<< The pepper is strangely spicy but very tasty. >>
-- always increase strength gettokenval "strength" if it < 50 |<< [break]Your muscles feel more toned. >> inctokenval "strength" 2 endif
-- sometimes increase charisma
-- grow dog ears checktoken "ears/dog" if not exists -- should check the existing type first |<< [break]Your ears transform, becoming more canine in appearance.[break]<cWhite>You now have dog ears.<c> >>
removetoken "ears" addtoken "ears" addtoken "ears" "dog" end endif
-- grow dog tail checktoken "tail/dog" if not exists -- should check the existing type first |<< [break]You feel your backside shift and change, flesh molding and displacing into a long puffy tail![break]<cWhite>You now have a dog tail.<c> >>
removetoken "tail" addtoken "tail" addtoken "tail" "dog"
|<< [break]<cYellow>Now would be an excellent time to stop taking this stuff.<c> >> end endif
-- grow fangs
-- grow fur checktoken "fur" if not exists |<< [break]<cWhite>You grow fur all over. >> renametoken "skin" "fur" end endif
-- grow digitigrade legs
-- grow up to two extra breast rows

wip ascii char: U+00A1 fore orangered
|<< You apply the fox morph potion. >>
-- always increase cunning gettokenval "cunning" if it < 50 |<< [break]You feel more cunning. >> inctokenval "cunning" 2 endif
-- sometimes increase charisma
-- grow dog ears checktoken "ears/genbeast" if not exists -- should check the existing type first |<< [break][Your] head itches as [you] grow[s] a pair of fuzzy, pointed ears.[break]<cWhite>[You] now [have] fox ears.<c> >>
removetoken "ears" addtoken "ears" addtoken "ears" "genbeast" end endif
-- grow fox tail checktoken "tail/fox" if not exists -- should check the existing type first |<< [break]A fox tail sprouts from just above [your] butt.[break]<cWhite>[You] now [have] a fox tail.<c> >>
removetoken "tail" addtoken "tail" addtoken "tail" "fox"
|<< [break]<cYellow>Now would be an excellent time to stop taking this stuff.<c> >> end endif
-- grow fangs
-- grow fur checktoken "fur" if not exists |<< [break]<cWhite>[Your] whole body itches as a thin layer of brown fur grows all over. >> -- renametoken "skin" "fur" removetoken "skin" removetoken "rubber" removetoken "slime" removetoken "scales" addtoken "fur" addtoken "fur" "brown" setspecies "foxmorph" "foxboy" "foxgirl" adjustview end endif
-- grow digitigrade legs

wip ascii char: U+00A1 fore skyblue
|<< You apply the bunny morph potion. >>
-- always increase libido gettokenval "libido" if it < 80 |<< [break]You feel hornier. >> inctokenval "libido" 4 endif
-- grow bunny ears checktoken "ears/bunny" if not exists -- should check the existing type first |<< [break]Your ears transform, becoming more bunny in appearance.[break]<cWhite>You now have bunny ears.<c> >>
removetoken "ears" addtoken "ears" addtoken "ears" "bunny" end endif
-- grow bunny tail checktoken "tail/bunny" if not exists -- should check the existing type first |<< [break]You feel your backside shift and change, flesh molding and displacing into an adorable puffball![break]<cWhite>You now have a bunny tail.<c> >>
removetoken "tail" addtoken "tail" addtoken "tail" "bunny"
|<< [break]<cYellow>Now would be an excellent time to stop taking this stuff.<c> >> end endif
-- grow fur checktoken "fur" if not exists |<< [break]<cWhite>You grow fur all over. >> renametoken "skin" "fur" end endif
